DOC.brief_summary: The investigator conduct study investigate possible mechanism weight loss associate exenatide treatment metabolic characteristic high responder ( i.e . subject achieve great 5 % weight loss ) exenatide treatment . The investigator also examine magnitude duration weight loss among cohort high responder 52 week treatment , 3 6 month follow treatment . Hypothesis : The mechanism weight loss exenatide fully understood , weight loss response exenatide highly variable , possibly reflect distinct metabolic parameter . By identify follow group obese woman lose great 5 % body weight short-term exenatide treatment , investigator gain insight possible mechanism weight loss ass long-term weight loss pharmacotherapeutic intervention .
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Outcomes The primary objective study : - To investigate possible mechanism pattern weight loss exenatide treatment , especially among individual robust early weight loss ( great 5 % weight loss 12 week ) exenatide . Secondary Outcomes Our secondary objective identify metabolic characteristic predict robust response exenatide treatment . Outcome measurement : - Weight - Body composition - Resting energy expenditure ( REE ) - Mixed meal test - Thermic effect food - Serum metabolic parameter - Hunger/Nausea/Satiety visual analog scale ( VAS ) - Physical activity monitoring Study Population The study population generally healthy , non-diabetic woman age 18-70 year BMI 28-48 kg/m^2 .
DOC.criteria: Females age 1870 BMI 2848 kg/m^2 Stable weight ( great 3 kg weight gain loss within 6 month screen visit ) . Ability give inform consent follow verbal write instruction English . Type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus diagnose accord American Diabetes Association criterion Unstable heart disease evidence ongoing angina Congestive heart failure Uncontrolled hypertension ( BP great 170/100 mmHg antihypertensive medication ) Uncontrolled dyslipidemia ( LDL great 200 TG great 400 lipid lower medication ) Tobacco , marijuana , cocaine , intravenous drug use Shift worker ( night shift alternate day/night shift ) Gastroparesis Inflammatory bowel disease irritable bowel syndrome Malignancy treat chemotherapy within past 3 year History pancreatitis Depression require hospitalization diagnosis psychosis Renal insufficiency ( eGFR less 50 ) Transaminases great 2 time normal range Pregnancy within 6 month screen visit Lactation Failure use medically approve contraceptive method ( monophasic oral contraception , intra uterine device , surgical sterilization 2 combine barrier method ) History eat disorder ( anorexia , bulimia laxative abuse ) Treatment FDAapproved overthecounter weight loss medication within 6 month , exception Xenical weight loss History gastric bypass surgery gastric staple Biochemical evidence hyper hypothyroidism , new diagnosis hypo hyperthyroidism within 3 month screen visit Previous treatment exenatide Discretion PI
